alert.note: Alert for McCulloch; San Saba (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 26 at 6:43PM CST by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN MCCULLOCH AND SOUTHWESTERN SAN SABA COUNTIES THROUGH 715 PM CST... At 643 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Voca, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Voca and Camp San Saba. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
